page.title: 07Recreation in Twyford
page.content: This is what some of us at Colleton school do in our spare time:{ {Juliette:}I go swimming every Saturday with my best friend. I go dancing every Saturday and Wednesday as well. I want to be a professional dancer when I grow up. My Mum's hobbies are gardening and eating Helman's mayonnaise. My dad's hobbies are making money, business and playing hockey. {Simon:}I go to Youth Club from 6.30 to 8.30 on Thursday. There is a sweet shop,a pot black table, table tennis and a dart board. My favourite thing is the pot black table. {Scott:}I play squash, take part in Young Farmers and my hobby is mower mending. {Ricky:}I play on my BMX bike and go to a Youth Club. My hobby is finding out about lorries.
